about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer & Creative Problem Solver
about.description: I'm a passionate full-stack developer with expertise in building modern, scalable web applications. I love turning complex problems into simple, beautiful, and intuitive solutions.
about.passionText: I'm driven by the desire to create exceptional digital experiences. Whether it's crafting pixel-perfect UIs or architecting robust backend systems, I bring creativity and technical excellence to every project.

harmonically.title: Full-Stack Developer
harmonically.description: Developing and maintaining web applications, working with modern technologies to deliver high-quality digital solutions for enterprise clients.

united.title: Network Operations Center (NOC) Specialist
united.description: Troubleshoot network issues, detect and respond to alerts, configure and deploy network equipment, and support remote access services.

oscar.title: Business Operations Manager
oscar.description: Managed and participated with a team in a printing house and cybercaf√©. Fixed streamlining issues, learned various printing tools, and participated in pricing and customer negotiations.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Let's work together on your next project
contact.description: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your visions.
